section.name: What is it?
section.p: The jSPF library is pure Java SPF implementation. It was designed to match the current SPF-Specs of 2006-2007 (See RFC section). SPF is also knows as Sender Policy Framework. It was designed to detect email spoofing.This is the solution if you ever was tired of getting spam from yourself. For more informations see openspf website or new openspf website .

subsection.p: After some more work was done, we proud to announce the release of jSPF-0.9b4.
After a fully rewrite of spf-java we finally release jSPF.

section.name: releases
section.p:
Latest and Stable: jSPF v0.9b4
jSPF v0.9b4 is the current release. Both binary and source distributions are available.
This release passes all YAML tests published by openspf.org (still under development). So it should be fully RFC4408 compliant.

Get your hands on the latest versions..
We put significant milestones, and potential release candidates in the download area.
Whilst the quality of these versions cannot be guaranteed they may contain important bug fixes and cool new features.
